title: What is Ekko a Tank, an assassin or a fighter? Riot Make up your mind!
body:
In Lcs he is played as a tank because of his ridiculous broken shield and stun.
In soloqueue he is that annoying midlane stomper assassin.
Some people play him top since his winrate top seems higher than mid.

replies.body: basically, if hes jungling they build him tank, if hes mid they build him damage..
You can build a champion into what ever you want in this game.
Why not Zoidberg.  I mean Why not all 3?  Diversity in a champion is good.  You have options you can build him into multiple kinds of roles.
he just has alot of base damages and % hp execute... so its unclear to professional players what he is most optimal at.
